summary: Water quality is generally stable but pH is slightly elevated and TDS is decreasing.

insights.recommendation: Consider adding pH-lowering agents to maintain optimal levels for tilapia and plants.
Monitor TDS closely; ensure nutrient levels are adequate for plant growth.
Ensure water temperature remains within optimal range for tilapia (24-30°C).

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.036 / 7.014 / 7.106 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 327.945 / 307.8 / 332.5 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 25.45 / 23.56 / 28.56 °C (trend: up)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
